com.ibm.team.scm.client

Interface IFlowNodeConnection.IComponentDeletionOp

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IFlowNodeConnection.IComponentOp
    Enclosing interface:
    IFlowNodeConnection

    public static interface IFlowNodeConnection.IComponentDeletionOp
extends IFlowNodeConnection.IComponentOp
    Marker interface representing an operation that drops a component from a workspace or stream. Instances are manufactured by IComponentOperationFactory, and used in IFlowNodeConnection.applyComponentOperations(List, IProgressMonitor)
    Since:
    0.6 (RTC 1.0)
    Restriction:
    Clients should not implement this interface.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface com.ibm.team.scm.client.IFlowNodeConnection.IComponentOp

        getComponent, requiresDetails
